price: 99. And he said (after his rescue from the fire): "Verily, I am going to my Lord. He will guide me!"
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: waqāla innī dhāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīni
